title: Emergency Khalil Mack Pod | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 292)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark link up for an emergency discussion of the Chicago Bears acquiring Khalil Mack. They discuss the parameters of the deal (01:00), what this means for the Oakland Raiders (11:15), and new expectations for the Bears’ future (20:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
